Garlic Vendor: Garlic! Get your fresh garlic here!

Player: Is that actually the only thing you sell?

Garlic Vendor: Oh, no, I sell all kinds of fresh produce. I just have a very, very big supply of garlic at the moment. You see, a friend of mine told me that garlic would be a great investment, and I think he’s right!
I wish he could see me now. He got himself arrested last night for… something. Don’t remember. I’d help him out, but I spent all my money on garlic.

Player: ... I don’t know how to respond to that.
